name: GreenAds Global Pvt Ltd
description: GreenAds Global, trusted by over 5,000+ businesses worldwide, offers a wide range of solutions powered by the WhatsApp Business API. We help businesses enhance communication with features such as message broadcasting, automated notifications, WhatsApp Voice Call API, no-code chatbot builder, and a team inbox. GreenAds also provides opportunities for businesses, enabling them to expand their communication capabilities. Our official platform: https://one.telinfy.com/
focus_areas: WhatsApp API integrations for CRMs, ERPs, and other business applications
Bulk campaign capabilities with failover mechanisms triggered by specific events
Platform as a Service (PaaS) solutions: for customised business communication needs
